Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights flat hunting spanish speaking daughter hotel location relatively quiet whilst central road south gran via north plaza del sol surrounding shops cafes historic sights plaza mayor easy walk 2 subway stations closeby clean cool quick connections prada museum etc size train staion plaza del sol allowing travel city using metro hotel modern clean lives 3 stars twindouble beds hard shower time size fitted clean staff friendly buffet spain price excellent hotel paid prebooked rate 56 euros incl breakfast cant argue centre capital city noted rack rate reception 167 euros night standard accomodation worth premier inn location city centre recommended dont mind hard beds
